name: root
description: Analysis of a project using React and Svelte technologies

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:react && yarn build:svelte
scripts.build:react: cd packages/react-app && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn build:react:copy
scripts.build:svelte: cd packages/svelte-app && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn build:svelte:copy
scripts.clean: if [ -d build ]; then rm -Rf build; fi && mkdir build
